headline: Duke Energy Corporation (DUK): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Duke Energy Corporation on Paradox’s Substack by PARADOX INTELLIGENCE. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on DUK. Duke Energy Corporation’s share was trading at $123.54 as of October 3rd. DUK’s trailing and forward P/E were 19.90 and 18.21, respectively according to Yahoo Finance. Duke Energy (DUK) is […]

headline: CEG Outperforms Its Industry in 6 Months: How to Play the Stock?
summary: Constellation Energy's 79% surge in six months reflects its nuclear strength, clean-energy focus and shareholder-friendly growth strategy.
